title: Future Music-Sound Pack
description: Take your creativity to the next level with these inspirational tracks designed for futuristic and fast-paced games.
longDescription:
Future Music-Sound Pack vol 1.


This new Futuristic sound pack comes with 14 tracks designed specially for game inspiration, fast-paced games, futuristic action, also some noir & contemplative tracks for those "sublime" & space atmospheres are included.


https://soundcloud.com/soundartdesign-852236542/tracks


  • Cyber Blue: A deep ambient with piano and Arpeggios, good for dense and contemplative atmospheres.
  • Cyber punk Slow:  Cyber punk Aesthetics.
  • Dark Space : Big atmosphere for noir future ambient spaces, Blade Runner inspired.
  • Dorifto: Fast paced hard electronic for action moments, inspired in 90s drifting racing games.
  • Dub Loader: short track ideal for action menus.
  • High Octane: Upbeat techno for action or fast gameplay.
  • Magnic: immense space ambient ideal for huge landscapes & space.
  • Menu Wave: Electronic downbeat for chilled menus or slow pace gameplay.
  • Racing Madness : High energy & uplifting happy dance electro good for fast/action gameplay.
  • Soft Electronic space: calm arpeggios and a synth melody.
  • Space Organ: Big and spatial moments for sublime moments.
  • Void: intriguing & mysterious tones.
  • Motivational: A fast-paced arpeggio to add excitement.
technicalDetails:
Technical Details


Number of Audio Wavs:14

Number of Audio Cues: 14

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: yes

Minutes of audio provided: 33:32 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows/Mac
